  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes event listeners for choice boxes and the stages

    • handleBack

      public void handleBack(MouseEvent ev)
      Mouse clicked event listener for when back icon is clicked. Go back to the Results view.
      Parameters:
      ev - A mouse event

    • handleSave

      public void handleSave(ActionEvent ev)
      An action event listener for when the save button is clicked. Show alert dialog windows depending on the successfullness of the saving.
      Parameters:
      ev - An action event

    • handleAddCity

      public void handleAddCity(MouseEvent ev)
      A mouse clicked event listener for when the add icon besides the cities' choice box is clicked. Open an other window in which the user is able to create a new city
      Parameters:
      ev - A mouse event

    • handleAddYear

      public void handleAddYear(MouseEvent ev)
      A mouse clicked event listener for when the add icon besides the years' choice box is clicked. Open an other window in which the user is able to add new year data for the current selected city
      Parameters:
      ev - A mouse event

    • handleRemove

      public void handleRemove(ActionEvent ev)
      An action event listener for when the remove button is clicked. Show an alert dialog window to ask user if he is sure to want to delete the data for the current selected city and for the current selected year
      Parameters:
      ev - An action event

    • setSelectedCities

      public void setSelectedCities(ArrayList<Commune> cities)
      Setter for the selectedCities attribute
      Parameters:
      cities - selected cities in Main view

    • refreshYearChoiceBox

      private void refreshYearChoiceBox()
      Procedure refreshing years' choice box
